amendment.description: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to pay the salary and expenses of CISA Director Jen Easterly.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 282 (Roll no. 446).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 282 (Roll no. 446).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
